website_summaries.verdict: Super cool multicolor lighting option for people who need an easy install and desire lighting effects.
pros: Easy installation, but a Philips Hue Bridge is required as well to use this product
Can be operated with a smartphone app and Amazon Echo
Can use an extension product for more lighting

customer_reviews.title: Great premium light strip.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great premium light strip. It’s nice knowing I could use it outdoors but I currently have mine indoors and I honestly like the construction of this more than it’s indoor version. Note that this is pretty thick though so you won’t be able to lightly mount it to places like the back of your TV, bit if you are using it up against a wall or something you should have no problem. I wish the maximum brightness was a little brighter and that its color accuracy, especially in the reds, would be a little sharper. Those are not picks in an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeyman0

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE INDOOR MODEL
customer_reviews.text: Now I know this says “outdoor” but when ordering I looked for “indoor” and this was amazons choice and 1st up... thought it was what I was looking for and it’s not. Wanted for back of tv, these are too heavy and can have the extension added to them. Returning 1 hour after opening 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Update. I was super excited when I bought this for the back porch. I already had one and wanted to complete the look. However sadly this one just quick working a few weeks ago. This stays under cover in the back porch, both are mounted for ambient light. At first I though it was just an issue with the WiFi or Alexa, but it doesn’t work with the app either. We’ve reconnected everything physically and with the wireless but it simple doesn’t work. Do not recommend for the price we paid this should have lasted more the 4 months I got out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Used for under cabinet lighting
customer_reviews.text: Works great for under cabinet lighting. Overhang of cabinet hides the strip completely.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McGrail

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I have other bulbs in the Hue system. This was an excellent addition. Price is reasonable for the product. Though the entire Hue system is slightly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Bad product description and not compatible with old hue lightstrips
customer_reviews.text: The description never mentioned it was an extension or a different model than the previous one, and I have the immediately previous version and it connects with a 4 pin connector and this has 6 pins so there's no way to add it to my actual hue lightstrip system.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Montoya Gil

customer_reviews.title: Opens the possibilities ....
customer_reviews.text: This product added a new dimension to my outdoor balcony ... only drawback was that there isn't an option to buy a longer strand Like what I have ... just wanted a second option ...
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The light is less flexible than expected and a bit heavier than it looks, this ends up creating a sag with the provided hooks. Setup and configuration was smooth, and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Innovation!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was frustrated because I couldn't get my hue smart light to work on the patio. Eventually,it connected and now it is working. I love it! Unlike the conventional lights (light up outter area only) these light up my complete patio. Very Nice! Select your hue of choice. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: trudy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great looking light. I love how bright it can get. There is so many different colors and themes you can you with this strip light. I only wish it was longer, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights but....
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights but the strip itself is very heavy! Keep that in mind if going to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Timberwolf

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Unique light that added easily to my existing hue system
customer_reviews.author: jeramie marlin

customer_reviews.title: Best LED strip light
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but amazing lights . Lots of control and other apps available to do light effects
customer_reviews.author: Mat T

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Great Response
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of Phillips Hue products and they all work great! Bright vibrant colors, easy set up and great response from the app.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Family

customer_reviews.title: Helping Mother Nature
customer_reviews.text: Control the light by color or “scene”, from bright and vivid - to warm and subdued, all through your phone. Loved mine so much, I gifted the same to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice La Touche

customer_reviews.title: Buy This One
customer_reviews.text: Soo cool, would rather get this “outside” strip over the inside one
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Berman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be easy to attach to the back of a tv and was badly mistaken. It’s very heavy and you have to screw in brackets to the wall to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor light
customer_reviews.text: Love the outdoor strip. I will mention even with the brightness set to 1% in the app, the strip puts off a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Make sure to cut it in the right spot when making it fit
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance Outdoor LightStrip 2m/7ft (Requires Hue Hub, Works with Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, and Google Assistant)
product_meta.description: Expand your Philips Hue system with the Philips Hue Outdoor Lightstrip 1.98m/6.5ft. Bring smart lighting to places you were not able to before! Flexible in nature and with perfect, vibrant lighting, the light strip is ideal for optimizing your Smart Home. Choose colors to create ambiance when you are having a BBQ outside or pick a nice smart light setting when you are relaxing. The Philips Hue Outdoor Lightstrip 1.98m/6.5ft is WET rated.
feature_bullets: The Philips Hue Outdoor Lightstrip is Fully weatherProof, meaning it can withstand all weather conditions; The lightstrip can withstand Small puddles of Water and jets of Water from any direction, so no worries when there is unfortunate rain forecasted Lifetime up to 25,000 hours and 2 year Warranty; Wet rated, the outdoor light strip requires the Hue Smart Hub (sold separately) for the Full Hue Smart Experience

Expand Your hue system with a Philips Hue 1.98m/6.5ft Outdoor Lightstrip and bring light to places you were Not able to before; Requires the Hue Hub (sold separately); Choose Colors to create ambiance when you are having a BBQ outside or pick a nice light setting when you are relaxing; Use the provided mounting clips to installed the strip to any surface, and unreachable spaces; Lightstrip Outdoor 1.98m/6.5ft is WET rated
The Coating around the lightstrip helps to create a Single, bright, and Vibrant Colored light across the entire strip for a more aesthetically pleasing Smart Home

Voice control: Control your Philips Hue lights with your voice using Alexa, Apple home Kit, or Google Assistant; Pair it for home automation with your existing nest products or samsung smartthings system

Easily bend and shape the Philips Hue Outdoor Lightstrip for Your application; Place it into the ground to highlight Your pathway, or apply it with the Included clips and screws to any surface for ceiling or wall Lighting; Possibilities are endless

specifications.Included Components: Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance Oudtoor lightstrip 7 ft x1, PSU x 1, Mounting clips and screws
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars186 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
